about_the_game:
Welcome to Caliri Bay, a small seaside community with a fondness for art. You just opened your own art gallery, where you paint the wishes of your customers live, right in front of them.

In this 2D whimsical drawing game with a branching storyline, players will interact with the town through painting, explore the city by setting up shop in different locations, and form connections with unique individuals with their own lives and goals. As players interact with characters more, they may pose offers that change the future of your business in unpredictable ways. What will your gallery be known for?




  • A life of branching opportunities awaits in Story Mode - Depending on your decisions, your story might take you to drawing in a nightclub, the underworld, a fireworks festival, during a thunderstorm, on high seas, or even during a thunderstorm on high seas!
  • Earn enough money each day to keep your business afloat! Spend excess money in the shop to buy tickets to luxury locations, art supplies, or temporary bonuses.
    ___________________________
  • Free Play Mode lets you play an endless day without timers or judgement - Feel free to ignore customer prompts and draw your own masterpieces, or interpret them your own way to add to your gallery.
    ___________________________
  • Drawing in unusual conditions comes with its own strange challenges and surprises!
  • Meet over 100 unique characters with their own preferences and hangout spots! Once you met one, you can read up about them in the Guest Encyclopedia.
  • Yes, even Broccoli Steven.
  • A quirky and colorful pixel art style that blends the believable and the absurd.
  • A relaxing and bouncy soundtrack to underline your artistic adventures.
  • Everything you draw is saved. Favorite your images to keep them forever. Share them with friends, or access them outside of the game for further editing.


* As game development progresses, more features may make their way into the game. Keep an eye on our socials for news and updates! *

Minimum:

name: Silly Scribbles
short_description: Become the owner of your own art business! Draw the images requested by a colorful cast of characters and make a name for yourself! Discover the city, make unusual friends and shape how the story unfolds! You can even play with a tablet or touchscreen!
